biotools.summary: Query Tabular is a Galaxy-based tool which manipulates tabular files.  Query Tabular automatically creates a SQLite database directly from a tabular file within a Galaxy workflow.  The SQLite database can be saved to the Galaxy history, and further process to generate tabular outputs containing desired information and formatting.

bioschemas.name: Query Tabular
